arts.sum: Juventus coach Igor Tudor is short of options in defence for a crucial game against...

After losing only one of their first seven matches against Juventus in Serie A (W1 D5), Venezia have lost 16 of their last 20 against them in the division (W1 D3); only AC Milan (18) won more games against the Lagunari than the Bianconeri (17) in the top-flight. Venezia won two of their last three home league games (L1), including their most recent, as many as in their previous 13 beforehand (D5 L6); they could win two consecutive home matches in Serie A for the first time since January 2000 under Luciano Spalletti.
